p: Next, we infected human RPE cells with temperature-, UVB- or UVC-exposed viruses and monitored virus-mediated GFP expression. We observed that increasing temperature and prolonged exposure to UVC, but not UVB, reduced A/H1N1-mediated GFP expression in infected cells ( Figure 4A). Moreover, viruses exposed to high temperature or prolonged UVC radiation were unable to kill RPE cells ( Figure 4B,C).
